Title: Crimson Comfort
Description:
I am looking forward to our red whelp. They are, after all, my specialty!

I have already spoken with Amella, and I would like to handle the nest myself. Here is a list of materials. Bring them to me when you are done, and I can fashion the most comfortable cushion you have ever seen!

<Lasztak hands you a list of supplies.>
ObjectivesText: Gather supplies for the Ruby Hatchling's nest.
